Activity: Wake up, and check the email
Compile the marketing materials. Work with the team on the launch plan. Topic: Visual asset finalisation.
Final bug fixing and refinement of character models and animations. Make sure no visual bugs are present in the game.
Final bug fixing and visual polish of the game world. Ensure that the game world is appealing to the gamers.
Final review of the assets. Ensure that all assets are according to the standards.
Prepare documentation on all the final assets. Topic: Documentation on Visual Assets
Meeting with @PEOPLE to present and discuss the documentation. Topic: Document Discussion
Write a summary to the tasks in week 4. Topic: Week 4 Visual Task Summary
End of the work. Go home.
